title: How to unsubscribe from Canal+ Online (Poland)
description: Learn how to cancel your Canal+ Online (Poland) subscription through their website, mobile app, phone, or by sending a letter.

steps_web.title: Cancel Online via Canal+ Website
steps_web.description:
To cancel your Canal+ subscription via the official website:

*   Log in to your account on the official Canal+ website.
*   Go to the "Cancellation" or "Account Management" section.
*   Alternatively, access "My CANAL+ account" and navigate to the "Subscription" section.
*   Follow the provided instructions to submit your cancellation request.
*   Click the "Cancel" button to initiate the cancellation process.

steps_phone.title: Cancel via Phone
steps_phone.description:
To cancel your Canal+ subscription via phone:

*   Call Canal+ customer service.

steps_mail.title: Cancel via Mail
steps_mail.description:
To cancel your Canal+ subscription via mail:

*   Send a cancellation letter by registered post with acknowledgment of receipt to GROUPE CANAL+, Service RÃ©siliation, TSA 86712, 95905 CERGY-PONTOISE CEDEX 9.
*   Include your name, address, Canal+ customer number, and the desired cancellation date.

steps_android.title: Cancel on Android
steps_android.description:
To cancel your Canal+ subscription on an Android device:

*   Open the Google Play Store.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Select "Payments & subscriptions," then "Subscriptions."
*   Find Canal+ in the list.
*   Select "Cancel subscription".

steps_ios.title: Cancel on iOS
steps_ios.description:
To cancel your Canal+ subscription on an iOS device:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name.
*   Select "Subscriptions."
*   Find Canal+ in the list.
*   Tap "Cancel Subscription".

seo_text: Cancel Canal+ Online (Poland) subscription. Unsubscribe from Canal+ Online (Poland). Stop Canal+ Online (Poland) subscription. End Canal+ Online (Poland) membership. Canal+ Online (Poland) cancellation guide.
